snippet.title: MultiMino 2: Polyform - 1.0 Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Polyform is a block falling game that tries to extend the Tetris Guideline to multiple piece sets made out of different polygons, with multiple quality of life additions to provide a smooth gameplay experience. Along the usual Polyominoes, there's the option to play with Polyhexes and Polyiamonds.

Thanks to everyone who helped me to bring this game alive.

Get Polyform here:

https://axelfox149.itch.io/polyform
https://gamejolt.com/games/polyform/972747

Consider donating to support the development!

https://ko-fi.com/multimino
